item.title: New command effecting completely unrelated code? (P16)
item.dc:creator: @Demonified Demonified
item.description:
@Demonified wrote:

if (command.startswith("leet") && playerRights >= 3) { { addItem(3387, 1); addItem(3389, 1); addItem(3391, 1); addItem(3393, 1); addItem(4502, 1); addItem(2641, 1); addItem(7535, 1); addItem(1205, 1); addItem(7053, 1); }
When I compile I get errors about “public int EssenceMineRX” and “public int Publicchat = 0”, specifically stating that they are illegal starts of expressions. Without my command, it works fine. I’m not sure that the use of the code in my command is correct, I’ve based it completely off of tuts…

Help please? (Project 16 in case you forgot :P)[br][size=1]Posted at: October 22, 2006, 09:39:18 PM[/size][hr]…We can bump right?

Read full topic
